site.title: PrismGB
site.tagline: A desktop companion for your Mod Retro Chromatic
site.description: Stream, capture, and record gameplay from your Chromatic device. Experience your retro games on the big screen with pixel-perfect clarity.

features.title: Live Streaming
features.description: Stream your Chromatic gameplay directly to your desktop with ultra-low latency. Perfect for capturing those retro gaming moments.

features.title: Screenshots
features.description: Capture pixel-perfect screenshots with a single click. Save your favorite gaming moments in crisp, original resolution.

features.title: Recording
features.description: Record gameplay sessions to share with friends or create content. Supports multiple output formats.

features.title: Cross-Platform
features.description: Works on Windows, macOS, and Linux. Use your preferred operating system without compromise.

gettingStarted.title: Launch PrismGB
gettingStarted.description: Download and open the app on your computer

gettingStarted.title: Connect Your Chromatic
gettingStarted.description: Plug in your device via USB

gettingStarted.title: Click the Cartridge
gettingStarted.description: Start gaming on the big screen
